description.value:
Trigger A creature touches the manacles

Effect The spirit attempts to lock the manacles around the triggering creature's wrists. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The spirit loosely places manacles around the creature's wrists. Removing the manacles requires a single action.

Failure The spirit clamps the manacles around the creature's wrists but fails to lock them. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the manacles are removed as a 3-action activity.

Critical Failure The spirit clamps the manacles around the creature's wrists and locks them. The creature is flat-footed and clumsy 1 until the manacles are removed (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] DC 23, simple lock).

details.description: A spirit appears and arrests the creature by clamping manacles around their wrists.
details.disable: @Check[type:athletics|dc:18|name:Seize the manacles] to seize the manacles from the spirit, @Check[type:intimidation|dc:19|name:Order the spirit to stand down] (trained) to order the spirit to stand down, or @Check[type:occultism|dc:20|name:Exorcise the spirit] to exorcise the spirit
